message:
Hey iOS Developers
I've been working on this project on the side ( http://appdk.com ) and now I'm at the point of getting close to a golden release. AppDK is a Dev Kit for iOS developers and our goal is to make developing better mobile apps with as little effort as possible.
We're launching in a few weeks and we'll be happy to talk to iOS devs on HN to get feedback, suggestions or anything to try out. Hope to get feedback from everyone else here on HN, if you got any ideas that you want to throw our way free feel to email me AppDevKit at Google's Email Service.
Thanks!
Looks great, but the page is a bit broken. Features/pricing are not currently linked.
@drewmckinney  those pages are still work in progress so it not linking to anyway yet.. but thanks for pointing that out, that makes me wonder if i should just remove them
Also, the days of hiding your email address on the Internet are long gone (or you're using the wrong server)

Since this is probably a technical crowd, how about actually describing some details about this platform. Like what programming language can be used?  and why it's different than the 6 or so other 'make it easier than Apple' frameworks.
@undefined I thought the iOS SDK term should be concise enough. We have plans to add android support but for now, it's all iOS and Objective-C/C++
